spec.description: PolicySetSpec defines the group of policies to be included in the policy set.

description.description: Description is the description of this policy set.

policies.description: Policies is a list of policy names that are contained within the policy set.

status.description: PolicySetStatus reports the observed status of the policy set resulting from its policies.

compliant.description: Compliant reports the observed status resulting from the compliance of the policies within.

placement.description: Placement is the name of the Placement resource, from the cluster.open-cluster-management.io API group, that is bound to the policy.

placementBinding.description: PlacementBinding is the name of the PlacementBinding resource, from the policies.open-cluster-management.io API group, that binds the placement resource to the policy set.

placementRule.description: PlacementRule (deprecated) is the name of the PlacementRule resource, from the apps.open-cluster-management.io API group, that is bound to the policy.

statusMessage.description: StatusMessge reports the current state while determining the compliance of the policy set.

exampleYAML:
apiVersion: policy.open-cluster-management.io/v1beta1
kind: PolicySet
metadata:
  name: example-policyset
  namespace: default
spec:
  policies: []
